# cap-paragraph

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type                                       | Default       |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------- |
| `clip`   | `clip`    | If the text should be clipped at the end of the line. | `boolean`                                  | `false`       |
| `family` | `family`  | Defines the font family.                              | `"mono" \| "sans" \| "serif"`              | `'sans'`      |
| `level`  | `level`   | Defines the font size.                                | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"`   | `'secondary'` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Description...                                        | `"adaptive" \| "large" \| "normal"`        | `'adaptive'`  |
| `weight` | `weight`  | Defines the font weight.                              | `"heavy" \| "light" \| "soft" \| "strong"` | `'soft'`      |
